1020230.name: The Island: Into The Mist 그 섬 WAVETRACK
1020230.description:
This DLC contains the soundtrack of The Island: Into The Mist. plus, a few songs not used in the game, Only on this DLC.

Artists

sctl

HyuN
Linne
curima

Track List

01. Theme of The Island
02. final-rest-time
03. In The Dark
04. still alone
05. 유령 사냥
06. cursed island
07. Lone Snake
08. death squad
09. you don't know
10. dead end
11. imperfect
12. escape
13. you don't know (Original Mix)
14. dead end (Original Edit)
15. escape (Extended Mix)
